name: GKTurnBasedParticipant
desc: A participant in a turn-based match.

items.name: var lastTurnDate: Date?
items.desc: The date and time that this participant last took a turn in the game.

items.name: var timeoutDate: Date?
items.desc: The date and time that the participantâ€™s turn timed out.

items.name: var player: GKPlayer?
items.desc: The player object containing the participant details.

items.name: enum GKTurnBasedParticipant.Status
items.desc: The state the participant is in during the match.

items.name: var matchOutcome: GKTurnBasedMatch.Outcome
items.desc: The conclusion or results of a participant in a match.

items.name: enum GKTurnBasedMatch.Outcome
items.desc: The state of a participant when they forfeit a match or when a match ends.
